title: Login issue
description: Customer is unable to login to the application despite using the correct username and password. They have tried resetting the password multiple times, clearing browser cache, and using different devices, but the issue persists.

title: Payment failure
description: Customer reported that their payment failed during checkout. They attempted using multiple credit cards and PayPal, but the transaction keeps failing with an error message. Urgent resolution is required as this is preventing order completion.

title: Bug in mobile app
description: Customer experiences frequent crashes when opening notifications in the mobile app. They have updated to the latest version and restarted their device, but the app continues to crash, making it impossible to stay updated on alerts.

title: Feature request
description: Customer suggested adding a dark mode option to the dashboard to reduce eye strain during night-time usage. They provided mockups and explained that this would enhance user experience for many users who work late hours.

title: Password reset
description: Customer forgot their password and cannot reset it using the standard password recovery flow. They have not received the reset email even after multiple attempts and need assistance urgently to regain access.

title: Order not received
description: Customer placed order #2345 two weeks ago but has not received the package yet. They contacted the delivery service, but there is no update. Customer requests immediate follow-up and resolution.

title: Incorrect invoice
description: Customer received an invoice with an incorrect total amount. The invoice includes charges for items they did not purchase. They request urgent correction and clarification before processing payment.

title: App update issue
description: Customer is unable to update the mobile app to the latest version. The update fails repeatedly with an unknown error. They tried reinstalling the app, but the problem persists, preventing them from accessing new features.

title: Shipping address change
description: Customer wants to change the shipping address for their order that has not yet been dispatched. They provided the new address but are unsure if the change has been applied. Immediate confirmation is requested.

title: Refund request
description: Customer cancelled their order but has not received a refund. They have checked their bank account and transaction history but found no refund. They request a status update and immediate processing of the refund.

title: Account suspension
description: Customerâ€™s account was suspended without any prior notice. They claim they have followed all terms and conditions. They need assistance to understand the reason and reactivate the account as soon as possible.

title: Slow website
description: Customer reports that the website loads very slowly, making it difficult to navigate. They experience delays on multiple browsers and devices. They request urgent optimization to improve website speed and usability.

title: Coupon code not working
description: Customer tried applying a promotional coupon during checkout, but the system shows an error and does not apply the discount. They verified the code is valid and request assistance to apply the discount correctly.

title: Notification issues
description: Customer is not receiving email or push notifications despite enabling all notification settings. They rely on notifications for important updates and need troubleshooting to ensure timely alerts.

title: Profile update error
description: Customer attempts to update their profile picture but encounters an error message every time they upload a new image. They have tried different file types and sizes without success and need assistance resolving the issue.
